trans-unit.source: Queue Service REST API
trans-unit.target: Queue Service REST API

trans-unit.source: The Queue service stores messages that may be read by any client who has access to the storage account.
trans-unit.target: The Queue service stores messages that may be read by any client who has access to the storage account.

trans-unit.source: A queue can contain an unlimited number of messages, each of which can be up to 64KB in size using version 2011-08-18 or newer.
trans-unit.target: A queue can contain an unlimited number of messages, each of which can be up to 64KB in size using version 2011-08-18 or newer.

trans-unit.source: For previous versions, the maximum size of a message is 8KB.
trans-unit.target: For previous versions, the maximum size of a message is 8KB.

trans-unit.source: Messages are generally added to the end of the queue and retrieved from the front of the queue, although first in, first out (FIFO) behavior is not guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: Messages are generally added to the end of the queue and retrieved from the front of the queue, although first in, first out (FIFO) behavior is not guaranteed.

trans-unit.source: If you need to store messages larger than 64KB, you can store message data as a blob or in a table, and then store a reference to the data as a message in a queue.
trans-unit.target: If you need to store messages larger than 64KB, you can store message data as a blob or in a table, and then store a reference to the data as a message in a queue.

trans-unit.source: The REST API for the Queue service includes the operations shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: The REST API for the Queue service includes the operations shown in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Operation
trans-unit.target: Operation

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Sets the properties of the Queue service.
trans-unit.target: Sets the properties of the Queue service.

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties of the Queue service.
trans-unit.target: Gets the properties of the Queue service.

trans-unit.source: Lists all queues under the given account.
trans-unit.target: Lists all queues under the given account.

trans-unit.source: Queries the Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) rules for the Queue service prior to sending the actual request.
trans-unit.target: Queries the Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) rules for the Queue service prior to sending the actual request.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves statistics related to replication for the Queue service.
trans-unit.target: Retrieves statistics related to replication for the Queue service.

trans-unit.source: This operation is only available on the secondary location endpoint when read-access geo-redundant replication is enabled for the storage account.
trans-unit.target: This operation is only available on the secondary location endpoint when read-access geo-redundant replication is enabled for the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new queue under the given account.
trans-unit.target: Creates a new queue under the given account.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a queue.
trans-unit.target: Deletes a queue.

trans-unit.source: Returns queue properties, including user-defined metadata.
trans-unit.target: Returns queue properties, including user-defined metadata.

trans-unit.source: Sets user-defined metadata on the queue.
trans-unit.target: Sets user-defined metadata on the queue.

trans-unit.source: Returns details on any stored access policies specified on the queue.
trans-unit.target: Returns details on any stored access policies specified on the queue.

trans-unit.source: Sets stored access policies for the queue that may be used with Shared Access Signatures.
trans-unit.target: Sets stored access policies for the queue that may be used with Shared Access Signatures.

trans-unit.source: Adds a message to the queue and optionally sets a visibility timeout for the message.
trans-unit.target: Adds a message to the queue and optionally sets a visibility timeout for the message.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a message from the queue and makes it invisible to other consumers.
trans-unit.target: Retrieves a message from the queue and makes it invisible to other consumers.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a message from the front of the queue, without changing the message visibility.
trans-unit.target: Retrieves a message from the front of the queue, without changing the message visibility.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a specified message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: Deletes a specified message from the queue.

trans-unit.source: Clears all messages from the queue.
trans-unit.target: Clears all messages from the queue.

trans-unit.source: Updates the visibility timeout of a message and/or the message contents.
trans-unit.target: Updates the visibility timeout of a message and/or the message contents.
